scripts.build: bun build ./src/catalog/contracts.ts --outfile ./dist/catalog/contracts.js --external @gooi/* --external zod && bun build ./src/discover/contracts.ts --outfile ./dist/discover/contracts.js --external @gooi/* --external zod && bun build ./src/eligibility/contracts.ts --outfile ./dist/eligibility/contracts.js --external @gooi/* --external zod && bun build ./src/listing/contracts.ts --outfile ./dist/listing/contracts.js --external @gooi/* --external zod && bun build ./src/resolve/contracts.ts --outfile ./dist/resolve/contracts.js --external @gooi/* --external zod
